name: Autonomous  Chess Playing Robot
details:
Play Chess against a robot!
An ingeniously designed robotic arm for playing chess against a human. Also, get ready to face defeat by the game-theory algorithm in plac

name: Transformers
details:
What if Optimus Prime graced his presence on our club?
A 2014 Summer Project aimed at building prototypes of transformer bots!

name: Gaming Console
details:
What if your keyboard and mouse got replaced by a real life gun in your favourite games?
The project is aimed at providing a real life gaming experience integrating high end sensors, microprocessor and a little bit of coding for you to be able to play Counter Strike as you are in the game!

name: Digital Photo Frame
details:
A medicine dispenser disguised as a digital media frame, primarily aimed for the use by the elderly.
The photo frame also displays reminders and controls the medicine dispenser.

name: WASP
details:
Wireless And Similitude Positioning System
A project aimed at building a robot capable of indoor localization using WiFi. In other words, an indoor GPS!
